body:
I've seen similar issues with outdated versions of Rhino. Can you really make sure that you have a recent SR: the last one is [Rhino 5 SR 2015-2-26](https://www.rhino3d.com/download/rhino/5.0/sr/changes)? (go to Help -> About Rhinoceros to check) Thanks, Giulio
--
Giulio Piacentino
for Robert McNeel & Associates
giulio@mcneel.com
